reviewText: This is a wonderful presentation of the whole family! I also have the Gaither " The Best of The Crabb Family ", it sort of has the focus on Jason, and this you get to hear each of the members sing individually! I really do LOVE THEM BOTH!! Highly recommend this! You will love them!
Another gift for family. Had to get it for my grandmother since she likes the group. She likes the voice of Jason Crabb the most and I think I got this since he was with them in it.

Love the Crabb Family.. Wonderful God given talents that will bless your heart. Lots of great songs. If they happen to read these reviews,  Thank you Jason Crabb and family... You are definitely gifted  in reading what God wants you to do and know how to communicate with people...  God bless you brother.
We absolutely loved this.  I recommend this to everyone that enjoys Christian music!  We watch it at least once or twice a week.

I had seen a preview of this video, and was impressed, so I wanted to purchase it. However, I had difficulty finding it until I discovered it on Amazon. The music is so uplifting, yet energetic. You can't help but love the performances of each and every member of this gifted family. Don't hesitate to buy it. For me, it was well worth the search.
I tried this DVD in 3 different players and it turns out to just be bad quality. It freezes and skips.
This DVD IS AMAZING!!! I ACTUALLY PUT IT IN WHILE I EXERCISE ON MY BOWFLEX. MAKES THE TIME GO BY QUICKLY.
They are my favourite family of gospel singers.  Even though they have now gone on their own personal missions....I still want to get every DVD available.
If you are a fan of the Crabb family then buy this today.  It's a great addition to my Cloud Playlist.

The Crabb family are always great. I love Jason Crabb and have purchased his solo dvd. I enjoy his sincerity and his wonderful delivery of his music. He not only sings gospel but country tunes, and there all great. I became aware of him and many others by watching Bill Gaither. He has put a lot of singers out there so we can enjoy them all. The entire family is just awesome and you"ll love them. Jason.s father has written a lot of their songs and he is a great song writer. Money well spent...

Great compilation of the Crabb Family's greatest songs. Great variety. Great message. I personally like live concert albums and I really enjoyed this one. I like the Crabb Family and this is the first album that I have purchased of theirs.
I first saw this concert on TV and loved it.  I haven't been a tremendous fan of the group before, but this concert is great.  The voices and music are a delight!  The DVD is great quality.
One of the greatest Crabb Family concerts.  You won't be disappointed!
Great! Great!Great! Very uplifting songs,beautiful voices, fabulous musicians, good entertainers. Everything in this DVD is done to bring glory to Christ and make Him real in our own lives.
Great dvd and in great condition
